name: Panji Semirang & Candra Kirana
description:
*INDONESIAN LANGUAGE VERSION ONLY*

*EXECUTABLE FILE AVAILABLE TO DOWNLOAD*

A kingdom nestled right in the border between three kingdoms. 

Its ruler, the missing princess turned king observes as people come and go through his kingdom.

 He collected information instead of money as their payment and he asked them to gather information for him as they travel between the kingdoms. 

In return, they are allowed to use his kingdom to open their store and give them protection in their travel.

All of these are done to find a way to break his father’s curse, bestowed upon by the very same woman who had killed his mother.

He hasn’t however, found out what could be used to heal his father. Until the day when someone he knows appears in his kingdom’s gate…
